name: Data analyst (проектная компания)
description:
Responsibilities:

  • Russia, Ukraine, Kazakhstan S&D analysis (30%)
    • Country level S&D – Short and long-term view
    • Crop competitiveness (Grains vs alternatives)
    • Planting intention and planting progress
    • Crop forecast and crop modeling
    • Support the senior analyst
  • Networking (20%)
    • Crop trips
    • Input companies (Seeds, Fert, Agrochemicals)
    • Benchmarking
  • Communication (25%)
    • Coordinate the local SnD call;
    • Participate in the global SnD calls;
    • Presentation to customers/Suppliers
    • Timely reports
  • Data governance and automation (20%)
    • Support the design of the SnD and trade flows processes to allow further automation;
    • Support the implementation of the automated workflows
    • Identify data sources to be ingested and automated
  • Administrative and education(5%)
    • Conferences
    • Training

Required:

  • Education
    • Computer science
    • Engineering
  • Experience
    • 5 years experience as full stack developer
    • Database design
    • Automation
    • User interface
    • Dashboarding
  • Skills
    • Windows and Linux environments
    • Python (Pandas, SciKit, Matplotlib)
    • PowerShell
    • SQL, Java, JavaScript
    • Tableau
    • Fluent English
  • Behavior
    • Conceptual strength
    • Effective communication
    • Keen sense of priorities
    • Detail and consistency oriented
